message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's meet closer to the middle, time is money!
I appreciate you meeting me closer to the middle, Bob, but I think this is more reflective of the value I bring.  Let's not waste time!
Alice, let's stop wasting time and split this evenly.  We both lose if this keeps going.
